Name: Kavir Pants
Description:
Carrying Capacity: 0.4K ÂµSCU

Blending Habidash style and ingenuity, the Kavir pants feature fashionable flourishes alongside practical perks ideal for managing extreme environments. Several fabric pieces are sewn directly into a thick, integrated belt that divides the pants between a large elastic waistband and looser, breathable cotton blend fabric through the legs. There are also two bands of fabric that ring the shins to keep dirt and other elements out.
